mapper.insert: insert into parent_list(job_board_no, userid, care_addr, dong_addr, time_type, pw_activity, wish_wage, consultation, time_consultation, wish_age, wish_gender,title , content, lat, lng, writedate, hit) values(member_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{care_addr},#{dong_addr} ,#{time_type}, #{pw_activity}, #{wish_wage}, #{consultation}, #{time_consultation}, #{wish_age}, #{wish_gender},#{title}, #{content}, #{lat}, #{lng}, sysdate, 0)
insert into add_child(job_board_no, child_birth, userid, child_cnt) values(member_sq.currval, #{cVO.child_birth}, #{rbVO.userid}, #{cVO.child_cnt})
insert into jb_specific_day(job_board_no, select_date, start_time, end_time) values(member_sq.currval, #{sdVO.select_date}, #{sdVO.start_time}, #{sdVO.end_time})

insert into jb_regular_date(job_board_no, yoil, start_time, end_time, start_date, end_date, week) values(member_sq.currval, #{rdVO.yoil}, #{rdVO.start_time}, #{rdVO.end_time}, #{rdVO.start_date}, #{rdVO.end_date}, #{rdVO.week})
mapper.select: select p.status, p.job_board_no, p.origin_no, p.teacherid, p.agree, p.userid, p.care_addr, p.time_type, p.pw_activity, p.wish_age, p.wish_wage, p.consultation, p.wish_gender, p.content, to_char(p.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate, p.lat, p.lng, c.child_birth, (select count(t_userid) from t_p_table where job_board_no = p.job_board_no) tcnt , m.pic from parent_list p, add_child c, member m where c.userid = #{param1} and c.userid = p.userid and p.job_board_no = c.job_board_no and m.userid= #{param1} and( p.status='R' or p.status='P') order by job_board_no desc

select p.status, p.payment, p.job_board_no, p.agree, m.username, p.teacherid, p.userid, to_char(p.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate, p.care_addr, p.wish_wage, c.child_birth, t.pic from parent_list p, member m, add_child c, teacher t where p.userid = #{param1} and p.job_board_no = origin_no and m.userid = p.userid and p.job_board_no = c.job_board_no and p.teacherid = t.userid and p.status = 'C' order by writedate desc
select count(t_userid) from t_p_table where job_board_no = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into review(userid, reviewid, review_content, review_star) values(#{userid}, #{reviewid},#{review_content},#{review_star})
mapper.select: select * from(select r.userid, r.reviewid, r.review_content, r.review_star, r.review_date, (select addr from member where userid=r.reviewid) as addr , (select pic from member where userid=r.reviewid) as pic from review r join member m on r.reviewid=m.userid order by review_date desc) where rownum<=6

select p.payment, p.teacherid, p.job_board_no ,p.userid ,p.care_addr ,p.time_type ,p.pw_activity ,p.wish_wage ,p.consultation ,p.wish_age ,p.wish_gender ,p.content ,p.writedate ,p.status ,p.agree ,p.who ,p.reject ,p.origin_no ,p.payment ,a.pay_no ,a.parent_id ,a.teacher_id , a.refund_status, a.reimburse, a.pay_date, t.pic as pic, m.username from parent_list p join payment a on p.job_board_no=a.pay_no join teacher t on p.teacherid=t.userid join member m on m.userid = p.teacherid where payment='Y' and p.userid=#{param1} and agree = 'Y' and status = 'C' order by a.pay_date desc
